Technical Customer Support Agent Job at Ignite Energy Access




        
    

        
        Ignite is one of the off-grid solar energy companies in West Africa. Our mission is to provide sustainable energy solutions and innovative services that improve the lives of 100 million people living without electricity in West Africa. We are passionate about innovation, sustainability, and creating a brighter future for generations to come. As part of our team, you will have the opportunity to work in a dynamic and collaborative environment, where your skills and expertise will be valued and appreciated.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Technical Customer Support Agent

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Core Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Assist customers with inquiries via phone, email, and chat or ticketing system in a timely and professional manner.
	Resolve customer issues and escalate complex cases to senior staff
	Collaborate with internal teams to resolve complex technical problems.
	Diagnose and troubleshoot technical issues, including network connectivity, system configuration, and device errors.
	Guide customers through step-by-step solutions and escalate complex problems to the appropriate teams.
	Log and document all customer interactions, technical issues, and resolutions accurately in the CRM/ticketing system.
	Follow up with customers to ensure their issues are fully resolved and satisfaction is achieved.
	Stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends.
	Monitor deployed system performances and manage customer satisfaction
	Diagnose and troubleshoot potential issues to avoid downtimes affecting the optimal operations of Hybrid Inverter Systems
	Follow up on other tasks as assigned by the line manager


Profile 


	Diploma, BSc/BA or HND/OND in Electrical Engineering, or relevant field;
	1-2 years of experience in customer support, preferably in a technical related role.
	Customer-focused mindset with a passion for delivering exceptional service.
	Motivated team player with a passion for technology and customer service,
	Proactive problem solver with the ability to think analytically. Able to use analytical tools would be an added advantage
	Ability to multitask, set priorities and manage time effectively
	Independence in delivering on required reports accurately and timely with minimal support
	Good problem-solving, interpersonal and communication skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: ayobami.ajete@ignite.solar using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Executive Assistant to the Group Managing Director Job at First Ally Capital




        
    

        
        First Ally Capital is a wholly indigenous Financial Services firm, whose focus is on providing top notch advisory & investment services to individuals and organizations. First Ally Capital was incorporated on May 20, 2014 as an Issuing House, Financial Advisory and Investment Management firm, with authorized capital of N2.5 billion, and an issued and fully-paid capital of N1.65 billion. The firm was licensed by the Securities and Exchange Commission on November 20, 2014 as Issuing House and Underwriters.
     

            
    



The Firm commenced operations at a very significant point in the evolution of the Nigerian financial services industry and will leverage it’s solid capital base, the strong financial services background of its promoters and the excellent track-record and credentials of its directors and shareholders.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant to the Group Managing Director 

Job Location: Lagos
Job Type: Full Time (On-site)

Job Summary


	As the Executive Assistant to the Group Managing Director, this person works closely with the GMD, performing basic duties as answering phones, screening visitors, making travel arrangements, preparing reports, filing and organizing documents, recording meeting minutes, performing basic bookkeeping tasks and Ultimately contribute to the efficiency of our business by providing personalized and timely support to the GMD


Responsibilities


	Receive guests and clients on behalf of the GMD.
	Answer all incoming calls and messages.
	Manage the calendar of the GMD, book appointments, flights and schedule meetings for the GMD.
	Type, sort and distribute documents appropriately.
	File and organize documents within the office of the GMD efficiently.
	Provide general administrative support.
	Filing and retrieving corporate records, documents, and reports.
	Researching and conducting data to prepare documents for review and presentation by boards of directors, committees, and executives.
	Ensure at all times the neatness, tidiness and organization of the office of the GMD.
	Manage expenses within the office of the GMD.
	Dispatch memos to various offices in the organization on behalf of the CEO.
	Remain courteous and cordial to all internal and external guests.
	Performs other duties as assigned.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Content Creator (Remote)",
  "description": "Odixcity Consulting is an International Hr consulting and procurement firm. With expertise in Recruitment &amp; Selection, Performance management, Training &amp; Development, Compensation and benefits as well as Outsourcing of goods and services for organizations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Content Creator (Remote)

Job Location:&nbsp;Nationwide
Industry: Tech

Job summary


	We are searching for a driven, detail-oriented content creator to produce high-quality outputs for our business.
	The content creator will create content videos as well as marketing videos about our software products, update existing material, generate novel work, and identify new ways to reach consumers.
	You should also contribute to the shaping of our stylistic guidelines.
	To be a successful content creator, you should focus on appealing to consumers&#39; interests by creating engaging material.


Responsibilities


	Writing, reviewing, editing, and updating content for company websites, blogs, marketing materials, and all social media platforms.
	Conducting research and interviews to learn more about current trends, developments, and perceptions about the subject matter, and then contextualizing your findings.
